Open TamilNadu

Free information, Free society

Welcome to Open TamilNadu

Open TamilNadu is an initiative to make information about TamilNadu more accessible to its people.

There are many government web portals that provide information. Why this effort?

Open TamilNadu aims to consolidate information from different reliable sources and make information more:

  • Discoverable
  • Readable
  • Extensible
  • Reusable

Can you be more specific?

We are currently working on an example to provide more context. We will update this section once we have more information to share.

How can I contribute to this effort?

  • If you have suggestions or ideas, you can create an Issue in the Community project with the tag suggestion.
  • If you'd like to contribute code, please create Pull Requests in the individual projects listed here.

Support

For support, create an Issue in the Community project with the tag support. We will look into it.
